name: Roasted Garlic Aioli
author: NB Roy
summary: Creamy roasted garlic aioli can be made quickly with leftover roasted garlic. We love roasted garlic and tend to bake more than one at a time for convenience and to be energy efficient.
ingredients: kosher salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Trim off the top of the head of garlic to expose cloves
Sprinkle salt and black pepper on top
Bake in the preheated oven until garlic feels soft when lightly pressed, about 1 hour
Refrigerate until chilled, 30 minutes to 1 hour
Pull out individual garlic cloves with a sharp knife; place in a small bowl
Mash with a fork until creamy
Add mayonnaise, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, and cayenne; mix well until blended
Refrigerate until flavors combine, at least 1 hour
